description: Gets a OpenQA.Selenium.Screenshot object representing the image of the page on and saves the screenshot to a file, overwriting the file if it already exists.

examples.description: Saves a web driver screenshot as [page.png] (you can use different format, see below) to the given path (whole page - not including address bar).
Saves a web element screenshot as [element.bmp] to the given path (you can use different format, see below).

name: GetScreenshot

properties.onElement: The locator value by which the element will be found.
properties.locator: The locator type by which the element will be found.
properties.argument: The full path and file name to save the screenshot to. Support formats ['BMP','GIF','JPEG','TIFF','PNG'].

summary: Gets and saves a screenshot to a file.
